??? edu.ncsu.csc.itrust.exception

    ? ??
    ErrorList
    Used by the validators to create a list of error messages.
  • ?????? 
    ???? ??
    DBException
    The reasoning behind this wrapper exception is security.
    FormValidationException
    This exception is used specifically for when an action involves the correct and proper submission of a web form.
    iTrustException
    A specialized exception class for displaying iTrust error messages.
    NoHealthRecordsException
    This error message is thrown when checking for health risk indicators and the patient has had no health records entered.
